tweet: This morning, after extensive testing on our QA networks, we've successfully deployed Node release 1.24.2 to the #Cardano mainnet. This release supports the next Cardano protocol update (‘token locking’ HFC event codenamed ‘Allegra’) planned for 16 December, so looking good 👍

Tomorrow IOHK launches a new smart contracts devnet for #Cardano called KEVM. It utilizes a version of the Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM). On it Ethereum developers can write dApps in Solidity and deploy them Cardano to have lower fees, quicker speeds, and enhanced functionality.

In order to prepare for the upcoming $ADA hardfork we will be taking our ADA wallet offline starting on December 10th at 02:30am UTC. We expect to bring it back online within 48 hours. Deposits and withdrawls will be unavailable during this time, please plan accordingly. @Cardano
